imagenes.descripcion: The Universal Adjustable Bench Top Adjustable Hand Planer with 2-inch blade is a tool designed for precision woodworking. This hand planer is adjustable and features a 2-inch blade, making it versatile for a variety of woodworking tasks. It is ideal for smoothing and flattening wood surfaces, and its adjustable nature allows for a customized planing experience.

The 12Pcs/15Pcs 1/4 6mm 8mm Shank Router Bit Set Router Bit is a set of Chinese tools designed for woodworking. These tools are used for trimming, grooving and engraving wood. They are made of carbide, a material known for its durability and wear resistance. The set includes bits with 1/4, 6 mm and 8 mm shank sizes, which provide versatility for different woodworking tasks. This set is ideal for DIY woodworking projects.

The carpenter's planer for wood chamfer is a tool designed for woodworking. This hand planer is used to plane corners and cut wood, making it ideal for woodworking jobs that require precision. Chamfer refers to a cut that is not perpendicular to the face of the workpiece, which can give a more aesthetically pleasing finish.

The adjustable-temperature electric wood planer is a versatile woodworking tool. It allows you to customize the temperature, making it suitable for different types of wood and various projects. This tool can be used for marking, allowing you to leave your unique mark on your creations. It is also ideal for wood burning, a popular woodworking technique that involves engraving designs into wood with a hot tool.

The Twotrees Dowel Maker Jig kit is a tool designed for woodworking. It includes an adjustable dowel cutter that can be adjusted to cut dowels from 8mm to 20mm in size. This tool is designed to be used with an electric drill to mill dowels and round rods. It is suitable for creating wooden dowel rods and is an excellent auxiliary tool for various woodworking tasks. This dowel jig kit can help you create accurate and uniform dowels for your projects.

The Z4 wood router bit with 8MM and 12MM shank is a tool designed for woodworking. It features a Z4 pattern bit, which is used to create specific patterns in wood. The tool has a shank size of 8mm and 12mm, making it versatile for different woodworking tasks. It is suitable for face milling wood drill bits and is made of carbide, a material known for its durability and wear resistance. This tool is a end mill, which means it is used for precision routing and cutting.

The Drillpro Type 30 Aluminum Alloy Miter Track Stop is a tool designed for woodworking. This miter track stop is used with a 30 mm T-track and is made of aluminum alloy, a material known for its durability and wear resistance. This tool is ideal for woodworking jobs that require precision and can help you make more accurate miter cuts.

The set of 12 wood carving chisels is a complete set designed for woodworking. These chisels are known for their ability to glide through wood like butter, providing a smooth and efficient carving experience. The set includes 12 different chisels, offering a variety of sizes and shapes to suit all types of carving needs. This set is suitable for all skill levels, from beginners to experienced woodworkers. The quality of these carving tools ensures durability and precision, making them a great addition to any woodworking tool set.

The URLWALL 165PCS Threaded Inserts Nuts is a complete set designed for woodworking and furniture assembly. This kit includes M4, M5, M6 and M8 threaded nuts, providing a variety of sizes to suit different needs. These threaded inserts are designed to be screwed into wood, providing a secure and durable connection for bolts. They feature a hex drive, allowing for easy installation with a hex wrench or power drill. This set is ideal for use in wood furniture and is a valuable addition to any tool kit.

The Tool Steel Single Wire Pull Plane is a hand-held planer designed for woodworking. It is available in three sizes: 160 mm, 200 mm and 245 mm, making it versatile for a variety of woodworking tasks. This tool is ideal for smoothing and shaping wood, and its single wire design allows for precision work. It makes a great gift for DIY enthusiasts and those interested in wood decorating.

Professional woodworking tool designed to help you drill straight holes with precision. It comes with 6 drill guides and can be adjusted up to a width of 6.75 inches. All-metal construction ensures durability and reliability for your woodworking projects.

10 inch manual Chinese hand planer with adjustable metal blade. This tool is used in carpentry to cut thin sheets of wood. It is a hand tool that can be useful for a variety of woodworking tasks. The adjustable blade allows you to precisely control the thickness of the shavings.

Chinese tool, specially designed for lath profiling. This tool is designed to help you create precise cuts and profiles in wood panels. It is a flexible curved jig guide that can be adjusted to fit the shape you are trying to cut. This can be particularly useful for complex woodworking projects that require non-standard shapes. The tool measures 1 meter in length, which provides sufficient length for most woodworking tasks.

Set of forged curved gouges. This set includes 8 pieces of rounded chisels, also known as bent chisels. These tools are commonly used in woodworking to carve intricate designs and patterns. The curved shape of the chisel allows for greater control and precision, especially when working with rounded objects such as a kuksa (a type of vessel traditionally carved from wood). These tools are hand-forged, indicating a high level of craftsmanship and durability.

Versatile tool made of durable 304 stainless steel and aluminum. It is designed for planing and milling bar sizes ranging from 14 to 36 inches. This makes it suitable for a wide range of woodworking projects. The router's portability allows you to take it to different job sites, making it a convenient addition to your tool collection.

Miter jig for T-slot joinery. This tool is designed to help you make precise cuts on woodworking projects. It is made of durable aluminum and measures 19x9.5 mm. The jig can be adjusted from 300mm to 500mm, making it versatile for different sizes of projects. It is designed for use with a table saw or router table and includes a miter gauge for accurate measurements.

The 7-in-1 woodcarving tool kit includes a carving hook knife, a wood carving knife, a chip carving knife, gloves, and a carving knife sharpener. This kit provides all the basic tools you need to begin your woodworking journey.

3-piece spoon carving hook knife set. These tools are hand-forged and designed specifically for carving spoons, bowls, kuksa and other hollow forms in woodworking projects. The set includes different types of hook knives to suit various carving needs. These tools are essential for any woodworker interested in carving spoons and bowls.

DEEFIINE 8pcs HSS Wood Turning Tools Lathe Chisel. This kit includes 8 high speed steel (HSS) wood turning tools with beech handles. These tools are designed for use with a lathe and are ideal for a variety of woodworking tasks such as carving, shaping and wood turning. The beech handles provide a comfortable grip for precision work.

Drillpro manual edger. This tool is designed for woodworking and is used to trim the edges of wood pieces. It is a dual edge trimming tool, which means it can trim both sides of the edge at the same time. This can be especially useful for tasks that require precision and consistency.

5A single flute carbide end mill for inch. This tool is designed for woodworking and is used to cut aluminum. It is a CNC end mill that can also be used for milling wood. The single-edge design allows for efficient chip evacuation, making it a good choice for high-speed machining.

HONGDUI 2 in 1 mini carbide wood scraper. This tool is designed for woodworking and used for scraping glue and other materials. It features a carbide insert for durability and an aluminum alloy handle for a comfortable grip. The 2-in-1 design makes it a versatile addition to your woodworking tool collection.

Lehman's Wood-Splitting Froe. This tool is made of hickory and steel, making it durable and ideal for woodworking and firewood making. It is designed to split wood along the grain with ease. The tool is made with the highest quality craftsmanship.

5-piece set of Wood Polishing Wheels. These tools are designed for wood carving and are used with a rotary disc sanding tool. They are abrasive engraving discs that can be used with an angle grinder. The hole size is 22 mm, so they are compatible with a variety of tools. These discs can be especially useful for detailed woodworking projects that require fine grinding and polishing.
